headings: Much of today’s world is driven by the financial marketplace.
Earn a Master’s Degree at the Same Time
What Can You Do With a Finance Degree?
Why Earn My Finance Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: Can you see yourself trading stocks at a brokerage firm? Maybe you’re interested in banking or corporate finance, or in being a personal financial planner. If you are drawn to any of these exciting career fields, then a B.B.A. in finance could be for you.

Our wide-ranging program includes classes in everything from money and banking, personal and corporate finance, and estate planning - to investments, portfolio management, international finance and more. You’ll learn the monetary and financial knowledge you need to successfully adjust to the changing global economy. You’ll also gain practical skills through our robust paid internship program, job shadowing with local financial professionals and engaging with local businesses.
Contact Information
The Norris-Vincent College of Business is accredited by AACSB International.
You also have the option of applying for our integrated program that allows you to earn your B.B.A. in Finance and yourMaster of Business Administration(MBA) degree in as little as five years.

Our professional faculty bring real-world experience to the classroom and offer a global view of finance and business. You’ll have the chance to work with them on research projects, and their connections in the local financial community can help you gain access to internships and other networking opportunities.
Finance Faculty and Staff
ASU Distinguished ScholarshipsOur premier scholarships are awarded based on your academic achievement, and you don’t even have to apply. You are automatically considered once you are admitted to ASU.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
Blue and Gold GuaranteeIf you have financial need, you may qualify forfree tuitionto attend Angelo State.
Earning your bachelor’s degree in finance will open doors for you as a financial manager at banks, businesses, investment firms and nonprofit organizations, or you can start your own business.

The U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics reports that there continues to be strong demand for financial managers and analysts, market research analysts and personal financial advisors, as well as in other finance-related fields.
Explore Career Possibilities

You can earn a Certificate in Banking by completing a specific four-course block within your degree plan. It also includes a paid internship. You get a valuable added credential without having to take extra classes. A certificate could give you an advantage when applying for a job or for graduate school. Additional paid internship and shadowing opportunities are also available.

You can join our Financial Management Association student group to learn investing techniques and participate in networking and professional development activities. You’ll also have access to all the services in ourCenter for Student Success. It’s a one-stop resource to help you achieve your academic and professional goals and enhance your college experience.

You can gain a global perspective of various business and financial practices on our annual summer study abroad trip to Europe. You’ll visit cities in nine European countries that host numerous multinational corporations and other international organizations. You’ll also get to visit a variety of historical sites to truly broaden your horizons.

Take your education to the next level in theASU Honors Program. Through special courses, cultural events, research and community engagement, we’ll help you transform your intellectual and personal talents into marketable skills for your future. You’ll also have the opportunity to participate in prestigious internships, fellowships and other programs to reach your full potential.
Explore the Honors Advantage

OurFreshman Collegeis a one-stop resource for programs and services that help you transition into college life, improve your communication skills, and engage in active learning. You can also get academic help in theMath LabandWriting Center, receive peer mentoring and tutoring throughSupplemental Instruction, or set up onlinetutoringsessions.
